name: Mirage (itch) (milo_2008)
description:
Mirage is a game about a guy in the sahara with only 4 maps and no water(Get to day 20 for ending)

Goal: Make it to day 20 without dying

Controls: Use the arrow keys to choose the place you wanna travel. Hold space to go to the nearby lake for water.  And press (U) to use youre map

This game is made for the :

Community Game Jam
